评论概述: Cute unicorn dress in comfy polyester
评论详情: Super cute long-sleeved unicorn dress in easy-to-care for polyester. So easy to get dressed, just slip it over your head. This is the style that my granddaughter loves! Easy to pull on over her head.  The dress is a simple design with a high waist and a cute V cutout in the back of the dress. Great for school or a night out.

The dress material is extremely soft and lightweight.  The pattern is so cute and looks just like the pictures.  The size fits as expected.  It is not see-through and would be good to wear during fall days when cooler out but not too cold.  I did notice long strands of sting hanging inside the dress where there was stitching.  I don’t want to cut it off in case it opens up the seam.  Overall, I’m really pleased with this dress and my daughter loves it!
This is a cute kids dress that fits true to size. It looks cute on my kiddo and she loves the design. The fabric is soft and doesn't irritate her at all.
This dress is adorable! Perfect for the fall. The back has a nice cut-out detail usually not seen with cotton dresses. Fits a girl who's almost 6 years old well.

The style, fit, color, feel of the fabric, and how easy it washes earn this dress a 5 star! The only drawback I noticed is that it runs small. I bought a typical size for my 5 year old but the sleeves don’t come down to her wrists and it’s short enough I want her wearing pants rather than tights under it. My 5 year old doesn’t care about the slightly shorter sleeves, she is quite happy wearing this dress, it’s definitely a hit!
My Daughter loves it. The dress fits well and she loves the design and want to wear it every day. Great print and can be an everyday wear. Very pretty, lightweight and comfortable. Washed up well !
Its a buttery soft material but a but thin. It fits tts and after 1 wash and dry we have no shrinkage. No loose threads and good seams. Would recommend

I got this dress for my daughter and she looks adorable in it.  I ordered her normal size and it fits perfectly.  I do have her wear shorts under it as it isn't super long.  It has a lot of stretch so it is easy for her to get on and comfortable to wear, not restrictive.  The fabric is that soft brushed stuff that is so popular right now and my daughter loves it.  It handles the washer and dryer well and still looks new despite many washes.

This is a cute, soft, and very stretchy dress but it fits TIGHT if you order the size your little one currently wears. My daughter is a solid 7/8 so I ordered size 8 in this dress. While the dress technically fits because it’s stretchy and my daughter is slim, it’s quite tight. My daughter says it is super soft inside so she likes it, but I would size up at least 1 size if you don’t want the bodice skin-tight. The skirt is flowy but not super twirly. It’s still a cute dress for school though, especially since my daughter loves unicorns.
Ordered 2 sizes up. And no. It’s way to small.

This is a cute dress but the fabric is a little thin.  It also runs a little small.  My granddaughter is just into 5t and usually has a bit of room in it .  The tag on this says 6T (is that even a thing?), it  runs like a very small 5t.
I got this for my 3.5 year old and she likes it. The fabric is nice and soft but I will say that it runs small. Maybe consider sizing up.

This is a cute dress! When I say it’s springy, I mean it will be perfect to wear in the early spring when it’s still a little cool, and I also mean that with the polyester-spandex combination, the material itself has a spring to it. It’s a stretchy, slippery fabric and for that reason, I expect that my daughter will be able to wear it for two spring seasons! I’m very pleased.

The date for photographs at my daughter's school is approaching. There is no doubt that this dress will be perfect for that day. My daughter loved it. Simple and the fabric is super fresh. He loved the design.

It's an instant hit with my 6yo, who insisted on wearing it to school the day after it arrived. The dress sizing fits as expected, and so is just a little big on her (she's a petite, just barely 6yo), which gives plenty of room to grow into it as fall arrives. The fabric is stretchy and soft. It's well made, with all the seams securely stitched, and machine washable. It is going to make a great any occasion dress for fall. It's lightweight enough to wear with shorts or pants without being bulky, and long enough to wear without them. We chose the "cute flower" pattern, and the color is true to the product photos.
